title: when is riot going to realize how broken vayne is
body: she has the same amount of attack damage as every other adc but yet she also gets 12% max hp true damage. it would be one thing if when she bought items, she only gets half the damage they give every one else. that might even things out. but when vayne can ult, tumble and kill in you in 3 autos shes broken. oh but wait guys....riot took 3 ad away from her so its all even! shes the most broken thing in league right now. there is no way to counter her. she completely out damages caitlyn without even trying, so there goes that counter. all she has to do is be the first to land an auto and she wins. her % dmg needs to be reduced to like 9% at max rank.

replies.body: If Vayne can do 88% of your max health in 2 autos, then you probably have much bigger problems than % max health true damage.
I do find her unfun to play against, but i don't think she is nerf worthy, at least not right now.

She literally had all the power shifted on her Silver Bolts to more of a late game orientation with the removal of the base damage that had allowed her to bust not only tanks but squishies open. Which is the one thing people absolutely hated about her. Now she busts tanks more than she busts the squishies early game, and is still one of the easiest to gank ADCs.

The problem is they tried to shift all of her dmg to her silver bolts, but they didnt take away her AD. They claimed her dmg would come from her W but the problem is noone builds bork on her anymore...which was a low attack dmg, but high % dmg item. This, in turn, kept her AD rather low but gave her more % dmg. Now everyone just builds a bunch of high AD items and she ends up having the same amount of AD as every other adc, while still having massive % dmg. She gets the best of both worlds, thats the problem. And until they find a way to balance it out, shes going to be broken. like i suggested before....maybe she should only get 50% or 75% of the normal AD she would get from items. Then she would HAVE to play around her silver bolts cuz just poking with autos and constantly switching targets would severely hurt her. It would give her a weakness, cuz right now she doesnt have one. Her laning phase is weaker than it was in season 5, but its still way too good. I also think they should remove the bonus AD she gets from her ult cuz she doesnt need it at all. I dunno i could talk for hours about how broken she is, just as an overall champion period, not just her kit. But alas.....it'll be in VAYNE!
OH NO!!! Don't say that... It's Quinn who needs the nerf not THE ALL OVER POWERED VAYNE!!! (SARCASM)

I was playing as renekton top, the enemy had vayne top, with flash and exaust.
I tried to play defensive, because I knew she would just kite me if i tried to fight. she kept poking me, by auto attacking , pressing q auto attacking (wow, those skills). So I tried to be agressive. At 3/4 hp, I used my E, she immediately knocked me back before i could even press Q, then exausted me and simply auto attacked me to death, I couldn't even run to my turret. First blood. I teleported to lane, let her farm 1 entire wave, so I could farm in turret. she kept auto attacking me at max turret range, if i wanted to lasthit 1 minion, she would use 3 basics, half my hp was gone, and she would Q away, taking 1 turret hit. My jungler refused to gank.
Ended 1-9-2, report renekton for feed... Vayne PUSHED UNTIL TURRET THE WHOLE LANING PHASE, easy to gank. I couldn't trade, even less kill,  couldn't farm and the only way to survive was staying afk in the middle of the turret, without farming or doing anything at all.
